title: Facet-governed Zn homoepitaxy via lattice potential regulation
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00881B, Paper
Xianzhong Yang, Yan Lu, Zhetong Liu, Haoqing Ji, Ziyan Chen, Jun Peng, Yiwen Su, Yuhan Zou, Chao Wu, Shi Xue Dou, Peng Gao, Zaiping Guo, Jingyu Sun
The irreversibility of Zn anode stemming from disordered Zn deposition and rampant hydrogen evolution has been a formidable challenge, impeding the practical advancement of aqueous Zn-ion batteries. Directing the epitaxial...
